name: bookshelf-postgres
description: A demo API project using bookshelf, knex and postgres
author: JDIZM

scripts.db:drop: docker compose start db && docker compose exec db sh -c 'export PGPASSWORD=${POSTGRES_PASSWORD}; dropdb --if-exists ${POSTGRES_DB} -U ${POSTGRES_USER}'
scripts.db:create: docker compose start db && docker compose exec db sh -c 'export PGPASSWORD=${POSTGRES_PASSWORD}; createdb -U ${POSTGRES_USER} ${POSTGRES_DB}'
scripts.db:import: docker exec -i postgres-db /usr/bin/pg_restore -U postgres -d test < backup.sql
scripts.db:backup: docker exec postgres-db /usr/bin/pg_dump -U postgres test -Fc --no-owner > backup.sql
